version_description:
What's new:

1. Added [Auto Use] function when you need to use multiple resource items for a task.
2. Added new hero Leah.
Adjustments:
1. Lv.11 or lower sanctuaries cannot be relocated to the Wasteland.
2. Improved Silver Weekly Card rewards.
3. Added a Headquarters level limit (based on state launch date) to the immigration rules.

NEW
1. Added wintry environment.
2. Added Reservoir War. Sign-up period starts on Dec. 2nd.
3. Added Floor 101-120 to Module/Cube challenges in Ruins Challenge.
Lead survivors in the last bastion of humanity

[Patch Notes]
1. Added Skip function to Ruins Challenges (after Floor 10).
2. Added an extra notification when the final wave of zombies attacks in Dead Rising.

Patch Notes
1. Added Spring Festival-themed sanctuary environment.
2. Added Nukaland. Sign-up period starts on Jan. 16th
3.Sanctuary skins can now be recycled in Bag.
4. Buffed Ironclaw skills.

[Patch Notes]
[New Content]
1. Added 8 Gear.
2. Added 8 Chip.
3. Added to Hero 101-120, Gear 121-140, Chip 121-140, and Ultimate 101-120 to Ruins Challenge.

[Adjustments]
1. Raised hero level limit to Lv.350.
2. Commanders can now search resource spots in the vicinity of their sanctuary.

Patch Notes
[New Content]
1. Added a new item Perfect Frag. Use it to exchange for a frag of a 5 hero you owned (excluding Scarlett, Ironclaw, Agent X, Eve, and Leah) on Enhance Hero page (no event pts granted).
[Adjustment]
1. Changed the look of EVA.

Patch Notes

1. Tutorial optimized
2. Game performance optimizations

Patch Notes
[New Content]
1. New decoration: Nameplate. Use to change the visuals of your nameplates on world map.

[Adjustments]
1. Adjusted the interface of sanctuary appearance.
2. Optimized avatar frames. Frame stats are now stackable.
3. Adjusted the content of King's Sword Pack/Ruler's Hand Pack: Light of Fortune frame > Apex Hero frame.

Patch Notes
[New Content]
1. New decoration: March Effect. Use to change the appearance of your marches on world map.
2. New decoration: Ambience. Use to change the appearance of your sanctuary on world map.
3. New Fox-exclusive nanoweapon: Inoculator.
